title: ParametricRangeQueryNodeProcessor support for time zones
description: It would be nice if there were a config attribute for setting a time zone for dates in the query.  At the moment I am using my own query node processor to implement this, but I stumbled upon ParametricRangeQueryNodeProcessor and it is very close to being usable as-is.

comments.content: This seems to be related to LUCENE-1768 and LUCENE-2979, as we need to change the config API, so the timezone would only be another param. Maybe that can be done with the work on those two issues.
comments.author: Uwe Schindler
